recipe.title: Peppermint Slow Cooker Eggnog Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup ; candy cane, crushed ; (60 g)

steps.step: Put candy canes in a sealed zip bag. Beat with a rolling pin or heavy object until crumbled into tiny pieces.
Add eggnog, candy canes, and chocolate to slow cooker and stir.
Cook on high for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with candy cane pieces. Enjoy!

steps_updated.steps_updated: Put candy canes in a sealed zip bag.
Beat with a rolling pin or heavy object until crumbled into tiny pieces.
Add eggnog, candy canes, and chocolate to slow cooker and stir.
Cook on high for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with candy cane pieces.
